website_summaries.verdict: Quirks aside, these balls are worth considering for anyone who wants a well-made design that goes far and tends to be reasonably easy to control.
pros: Generate praise for being durable and providing excellent distance for a reasonable price
Delta dimpling ideal for straight shots
Suited for players with medium to high swings
cons: Inconsistencies about how soft they are – some players feel that they are too soft, while others call them too hard
Rare reports from repeat customers that they are harder than they use to be

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fan of the e6 for a long time. It's no ProV1 or high dollar ball but I'm not scratch golfer or even close these days. Back in the day I could place balls on the green where I would spin back to the hole. Not anymore. It's a solid ball for players off all handicaps for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Reuter

customer_reviews.title: Changed to the e6 and glad I did.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Calaway Super Soft balls, but recently changed to Bridgestone e6 Super Soft balls. The difference is like night and day. This low compression ball flies longer and straighter than the Calaway. I would highly recommend purchasing these balls. Amazon had the best price.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I also like the new "B" logo. I've used the e6 exclusively for 2 years and now the e6 soft. I've gained approxmately 15 yards with this new ball and it holds straight. It also checks up on the greens with both fairway, rescue and iron shots. Since I'm not loosing as many balls I've noticed an issue. After 3 rounds of use with the same ball i begin to lose up to 20 yards on the drives until I swap out for a new ball. I'm hooked but can't find them locally less than retail. Therefore I'll continue getting good prices with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David Bailey

customer_reviews.title: I like these balls
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is all in my head but I seem to hit this ball a little straighter. Anyhow, I like these balls. I am a hacker, don't spin the ball and am ecstatic if I play bogey golf. These balls work for me.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for my slower speed and I still get great distance. Better feel, flight and all and better for me than the 330's. Getting older is still fun with this ball.
customer_reviews.author: George J. Millward

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball / Save Money
customer_reviews.text: The E6 Bridgestone represents one of the best quality/value propositions in golf. I get the same performance from this ball as I do from balls that cost twice as much (I'm a 10 handicap). I think this ball would suit the large majority of golfers, enabling them to play a quality ball designed for slower swing speeds at a great price. I get great distance and more than adequate performance around the greens. Highly recommended...
customer_reviews.author: iel76

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: I’ll tell you 100% if I was better at golf I would still own all of these! But I’m not and hit most things too right or too long or just plain in the water. I can tell you I looked damn good doing it. My short game is about the only golf game I have. There performed great around and on the green. Now off the tee.....I’m still figuring that out.
customer_reviews.author: Derek A. Weddle

customer_reviews.title: My best game ever
customer_reviews.text: I'm 57 and I just played my best game ever.Im playing with 30 year olds and my drives are longer and straighter,even out drove some of them.Not only my drives but my irons where on fire too.My son said it was the best golf he's ever seen me play and his buddy's said they where going to kick my butt in the parking lot if I continue to play like I did.Not just a lucky day on the course these balls absolutely let me play a better game.
customer_reviews.author: John Markham

customer_reviews.title: It’s the ball that works for YOU
customer_reviews.text: The ball goes Far and most importantly STRAIGHT! It really does help. It is amazing what they’ve done. I suggest finding the ball that fits Your style but if you are an average joe then this ball helps Correct for those little errors we average golfers make. I’m now out driving the guys that play regularly and have been banished to tee off from the back tees! It was said jokingly but it was said and that’s all that matter! Ha! Thanks Bridgestone!
customer_reviews.author: BillTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great ball. Feels good off the driver. A little straighter than competing balls.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been playing Titleist Pro V1’s for years and got tired of paying so much for them. I’m about a 9 handicap and tend to fade my drives. Some balls fade more than others due to dimple design. I am really impressed with these. Good spin on the green and tend to have less spin on my drives. Distance on drives is slightly longer due to less fade.
customer_reviews.author: Stevemtexas

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf ball, good dozen price!
customer_reviews.text: This E6 Soft flies off my irons with a little more distance. Only hit one good solid drive and distance is about par to my other balls. However, mishits on my Driver did stay in the fairway but did lose a good amount of distance. Will continue to use this ball, it has pretty good feel and spin was as expected, with will struck irons stopping on one hop.
customer_reviews.author: theunartistTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: These balls are a great deal
customer_reviews.text: They have a good feel off the club face and the distance seems to be fine. I don't hit the ball as far as I did 20 years ago, but these balls seem to give me the best distance for my current swing speed. They also seem to be fairly durable. The price is definitely right. Excellent ball for medium to high handicappers.
customer_reviews.author: Leon F. Washington

customer_reviews.title: Why Pay More - Fantastic balls.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why anyone would pay more for a golf ball. These are great, They are soft, go far and are straight, and are good on the green. Wonderful feel. (But they still get lost sometimes, even though they are high visibility yellow.)
customer_reviews.author: D. Bressler

customer_reviews.title: Replaced ProV
customer_reviews.text: Owned a golf distribution company for 40 years. Sold Bridgestone golf products as independent reps when no one knew the name. When the brand finally started doing well we were replaced by a company sales rep. Played ProV1 for years. Found one of these and played it and was impressed. For half the cost of ProV, I am playing Bridgestone again.
customer_reviews.author: Alphazu

customer_reviews.title: Go with Supersoft if you want soft......
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special about these... They seem harder then years past. They don't even compare to softness of the callaway supersoft.
customer_reviews.author: K & M

customer_reviews.title: in fact they seem pretty rock hard based on the non-scientific thumbnail test
customer_reviews.text: These are nowhere near as soft as you might think from the labeling, in fact they seem pretty rock hard based on the non-scientific thumbnail test. They go fairly straight and I would say very long. I hit some irons through the green at distances at least 10-15 yards above my norm, even with short irons. So much so my playing regular playing partners commented on it. Not much feel around the green. I usually buy the Titleist NXT Tour S which I've decided I prefer for the latter reason. Maybe some more practice with the 2nd dozen will convince me otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Flemo

customer_reviews.title: Good, but too Expensive
customer_reviews.text: I like these balls but they are expensive. I like the Callaway SuperSoft balls at least as much and they cost much less; I now play them instead.
customer_reviews.author: Gary A. Klein

customer_reviews.title: Long and Straight
customer_reviews.text: Long and straight. I played these and Pro V all summer. I’ll take these . Must be good price went up $10 a dozen .
customer_reviews.author: rick ingy

customer_reviews.title: Good affordable ball
customer_reviews.text: Ball does what it needs to do. If you're looking for spin around the greens, this is probably not your ball. But if you are new to the sport or just struggle to keep your ball in play, this is a good ball to play. And it won't hurt as bad when you lose one.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: First time out results
customer_reviews.text: My first round with these new balls was great. Finished the round with the same ball from the first hole and never had to venture into the rough to retrieve a slice. My golfing partner wanted to know if I had taken a lesson.
customer_reviews.author: H. Schmoll

customer_reviews.title: Great value in golf balls
customer_reviews.text: These balls are every bit as good and perhaps better than the big names but cost a lot less. I did find I was getting additional distance. I might have gotten a bit more control, but hard to tell as I am not a consistent player. The only downside is some surface scratching if you bounce off a cart path or other hard object. I will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: tp302

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good ball
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a good ball. They are still difficult if not impossible to find when I hit them into the water or out of bounds.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Siler

customer_reviews.title: Scuff more easily than the original e6
customer_reviews.text: I find that these are not as good on approach shots. They do not seem to hold the green as well as the originals. Also, they scuff more easily. I am going back to the original when I can find them.
customer_reviews.author: MnBoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for My Swing Speed
customer_reviews.text: I'm a senior and have tried many golf balls in the past several years and find for me the Bridgestone E6 has the best feel and ball flight for my slow swing speed.
customer_reviews.author: Cushman Ken

customer_reviews.title: A little roll out , not a Pro V1 spin/ stop , but ok
customer_reviews.text: Tried them out , they putt good. Definitely a good price and expect a yard or more roll out, the don't stop like prov1 but they fly straight and that great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: If you like a soft feel to your golf balls - these deliver. Good control around the green and plenty of distance...I liked them so much I decided to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: jr

customer_reviews.title: Lost so many, but not the balls fault
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Seems to go far an right where I aim, even if that's not the fairway. I like them, I order more and more and should probably get a lesson so I can score lower with these great balls by hitting the fairway off the tee.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ball. I really can feel it on the face of my clubs. With a good solid hit, it goes where you want it to. I will keep using these.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Great balls for the price...
customer_reviews.text: I have played two rounds with these balls and I can tell that they definitely help keep the ball flying slightly straighter. Good distance and nice soft feel at a reasonable price, you can't beat this ball at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Gator

customer_reviews.title: Great feel off the clubface, if you like the low compression feel.
customer_reviews.text: Great all around low compression ball. Hope I can still get good distance with these when my swing speed goes up so I don’t have to change balls.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: This item was made in the US, it is now made in Taiwan. Performance and distance have decreased substantially.
customer_reviews.author: Far North

customer_reviews.title: great ball. long and straight
customer_reviews.text: great ball. long and straight yet soft and at a great price. i uswd to play pro v but switched to this
customer_reviews.author: MilesColtrane

customer_reviews.title: Favorite golf balls
customer_reviews.text: My father is an avid golfer who asks for these every year for birthday and Christmas. These are his favorite golf balls for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love these gold balls
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a professional golfer, but I do find my accuracy increases when I use these Bridgestone balls. I have tried their E6 speed balls and I don't like the "feel" on the greens.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Campbell Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great golf balls for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love these balls. They are a good value and play well. The reviews on these balls are glowing for a reason.
customer_reviews.author: John Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Like the yellow.
customer_reviews.text: The balls flies. 6 handicap. I drop them in from high so they stop on the green similar to others in the price point. The high dollar balls spin wildly sideways on mis hits - go for this ball and score better.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Very good ball: performance equal to or better than Tiatleist NXT Tour S. and less costly.
customer_reviews.author: CDR USN (Ret)

customer_reviews.title: Fast Service
customer_reviews.text: Fine golf balls but no bargain. Similar in price to my local shop.
customer_reviews.author: Sometimes unhappy

customer_reviews.title: not new as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product description clearly described them as "new" but when I opened my first sleeve, there was someone's initials written on one of the balls with a sharpie. Not sure how this happens to "new" balls. I only found one that way out of 2 dozen, but that is enough to tell me that at least one of these balls is recycled.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Play really well for me because I do not generate the head speed to hit harder golf balls
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Hammel

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. It’s his favorite golf ball. He’s a 15 handicap. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: "thesheriff"

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much like a lot of other golf balls
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much like a lot of other golf balls. It's not a soft ball as I expected or was implied like the Noodle or the Callaway super soft. The yellow color is a little weird and makes it look kind of cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner ball for lower swing speed
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner ball for lower swing speed. I am currently comparing these against the Wilson Staff Fifty series. The wilson staff's are winning slightly just because of price point.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Durable balls
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable. My current ball has been used daily for 3 weeks for 18, 27, and 36 holes each day. 3 over par for 18 holes today and even par for extra 9 holes. Still working.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought they'd be.
customer_reviews.text: The soft E-6 yellow were better than I anticipated. they are easy to see and go far, and they do feel soft. Thanx Bridgestone..
customer_reviews.author: Frank A. Tortorello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for the golfer in your life
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure: I am not a golfer. I ordered these as a secret Santa gift for a coworker, per my brother-in-law’s recommendation. He’s an avid golfer and swears by these balls, so I’ll recommend these on his behalf.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Bierlein

customer_reviews.title: Model being fazed out
customer_reviews.text: Nice ball, unfortunately discovered that Bridgestone isn't making these, they have gone to the e12 now
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Soft balls for a great price. Great spin on then chip shots and they bite hard. No more slice!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my brother who loves playing ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my brother who loves playing with Bridgestone Golf balls. He has told me he is definitely going to put in his rotation for play moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Downing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item, but for some strange reason, they keep going in the bushes :)
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brown

customer_reviews.title: Foreeeeeee!!!! Best ball out there .
customer_reviews.text: Best golf balls I have ever used , will never not use Bridgestone , highly recommend!!! Power on the drives , soft around the green. The ball is true !
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Bridgestone 4 Prez!
customer_reviews.text: Bridgestone makes a quality ball at and affordable price. My brand of choice for years!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan S.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my husband. He’s been a fan of these golf balls for years.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: I am lucky to play 5 times a year. Last weekend was the first time I played since receiving the Bridgestone E6. First, they are remarkably easy to spot even when in the second cut. Second, they fly off the tee very nicely. I was able to keep more in the actual fairway than normal.
customer_reviews.author: ken walkmeyer

customer_reviews.title: These balls are STRAIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: These balls definitely fly straight! I usually have a small fade, but these balls have helped straighten that out.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Williams

customer_reviews.title: Practice balls in the sleeves
customer_reviews.text: I liked the golf balls but some of them in the individual boxes were practice balls-the word practice was on the ball. This is not what I expected to receive.
customer_reviews.author: kathy gower

customer_reviews.title: Kinda like an all season tire.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much as advertised not the longest or softest, but forgivable, and all around good. Probably will keep playing them.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Albert

customer_reviews.title: Great mid handicapper ball, durable and a great price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these before but spent more for them from wally world. I am a 14 handicap and this ball is more practical than pro v's for my budget. Spin is great and the feel off the putter is very smooth and true. Fast delivery to your door!
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good ball for the money! Has nice feel off the club face and good distance. The color makes it easy to track in flight. It feels soft and tracks true on the greens.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the E6
customer_reviews.text: Solid golf ball, for medium to high handicap. Love the way they feel. A+
customer_reviews.author: James Marino

customer_reviews.title: golf balls
customer_reviews.text: Hmmm...not much to say about golf balls. They are round, bumpy and yellow. Good.
customer_reviews.author: D.Blevins

customer_reviews.title: A great mid-handicap ball
customer_reviews.text: I have recently switched to the Bridgestone balls from Callaway, and the Yellow is really pleasing. The E6 soft has good feel and distance for my higher swing speed and 7-10 handicap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite balls
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, control and distance for a med. swing speed golfer.
customer_reviews.author: Siouxz

customer_reviews.title: Good winter ball
customer_reviews.text: Easy to spot in winter lighting. White is better in the summer. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Castner

customer_reviews.title: Compression v Swing Speed
customer_reviews.text: I know this is obvious with choosing a golf ball but you need to recognize lower compression balls may not achieve the distance you are used to with other higher compression balls even if your swing speed is consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Found my favorite golf balls
customer_reviews.text: Soft around the greens and getting good distance. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: z

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Putting Line
customer_reviews.text: I liked the feel of the golf ball, but the design of the putting line is just awful. The lines seem to be staggered and don't line up. It's incredibly distracting and disorienting when trying to line up a putt. I'd avoid. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: connor c

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Ball for my game
customer_reviews.text: Like these better than the ProV1 I used to use. My swing speed is not high enough for the proV and these seem to go farther. Great feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easily scuffed under normal play conditions.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love these, the scruff and mark very easily. I'm not talking about the ball hitting the cart path either.
customer_reviews.author: ELC

customer_reviews.title: Good ball!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my senior game. With my swing speed, it would be foolish to use a tour ball. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: SMK54

customer_reviews.title: My favorite balls
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Feel great, and I am pretty sure they cut down on my slicing
customer_reviews.author: Bob from VA

customer_reviews.title: Whack some laser beams
customer_reviews.text: They fly far and are very durable. My friend loved them
customer_reviews.author: Graeme J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I suck at golf so I loved the values of these balls.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Good balls but if i don't score well it's not the balls fault
customer_reviews.author: William L. Mckechnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I played the Titleist Pro V1 for year, but I had to change to a yellow ball so I could see it. Since Titleist does not have a yellow Pro V1 ball, I tried all manufacturers and models. The Bridgestone E6 soft was the best ball for me. To verify that it was the correct golf ball for me I went on the Bridgestone site and used there Find my Ball app which confirmed it was the right one. I love this golf ball, but I love the price even more!
customer_reviews.author: Deege

customer_reviews.title: sofr and long
customer_reviews.text: i like them a lot. good all around ball an an xlnt value.
customer_reviews.author: Famoudou II

customer_reviews.title: Longer then long.
customer_reviews.text: This new E6 is the longest ball for my 95 mph swing speed, it drives straight and has plenty of roll in the fairway and does a very decent job around the greens, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony P.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be of high quality, now if I could hit them in the fairway.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Love the yellow on the course! Also standing over ball with brightness provides increased focus on puts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: e6 Soft is a must try for all golfers
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel of e6 Soft off both driver and irons. Tried many different brands of golf balls and the e6 Soft is a great fit for my game in all areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Petersen GolfDrRx

customer_reviews.title: GREAT INTERMEDIATE BALL
customer_reviews.text: WAY BETTER THAN THE CHEAPER BALLS- GREAT WAY TO REDUCE STROKES.
customer_reviews.author: gint

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I get more?! 😭
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Suits my preference of feel for a ball. Soft and nice off the putter, chips around the green. Distance seems fine. Previously I’ve been using the Callaway Supersoft.
customer_reviews.author: Azlan Sharom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent distance (had to change club-selection mid-round due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent distance (had to change club-selection mid-round due to the extra 8 yards on my mid-irons) with good spin on approach shots.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny280

customer_reviews.title: Good golf ball for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good golf ball for the money. I have been playing it for awhile and am satisfied with the look and performance.
customer_reviews.author: RUTHANNE ELIASEK

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t as soft as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: For the same price, I’ll take the Srixon Q Star Tour
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: The product was given as a gift. These are ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was given as a gift. These are the golf balls my son-in-law uses. Only problem was not with the quality but with quality-control. Was sent yellow golf balls in a white box.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Obvious satisfaction because I keep buying them when I find a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl  C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in the time frame that was given. Performance wise I'm not sure I bought them for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel off the club face and they don't break ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, ya can't beat these golf balls. Great feel off the club face and they don't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite ball. It's great that I can quickly tell pick out my ball from fellow players.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Bridgestone E6 Soft is a great ball!
customer_reviews.text: Bridgestone golf balls are so far ahead of the others guys. One of the best balls made. Does it all and is a delicate balance between velvet and steel. I don't even think twice about what ball I'm going to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey C.

customer_reviews.title: Good golf balls.
customer_reviews.text: These are good golf balls. Haven’t tried these out yet but have used them before.
customer_reviews.author: Bh1839

customer_reviews.title: Great Golf Ball For The Price
customer_reviews.text: Best golf balls on the market at this price point. At 70 years old I hit it farther and straighter than any ball I've played. Feels good too.
customer_reviews.author: NC Golfer46

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great new balls. They come packaged in Bridgestone. This one is not a reseller.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Hiyama

customer_reviews.title: Old version
customer_reviews.text: They were not what I wanted to order, older version and older shelf life. Would not order again
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great ball.
customer_reviews.text: average distance with soft feel but REALLY strait !!! Great ball.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Malone

customer_reviews.title: Straight but bounce off the green
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. A little help in flight is good. These balls land like rocks, though. Treat these like distance balls and you’ll be happy
customer_reviews.author: RedGrant76

customer_reviews.title: I’ll use again.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for my game. 60 year old recreational golfer with a high teens handicap.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Buffington

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very Soft. Practice on the putting green before playing round when first using these
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Good value and received quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, lost them all and needed more.. wink wink
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: Bridgestone E6 Soft Golf Balls (One Dozen)
product_meta.description: The Bridgestone e6 Soft is a high performance ball with an incredible soft feel. It is designed to produce low driver and long iron spin for incredible straight distance. The advance mantle and cover work in unison to provide incredible approach and greenside performance.
feature_bullets: BRIDGESTONE GOLF BALLS: Switch to the BRIDGESTONE GOLF e6 SOFT golf ball and feel what it is like to gain accuracy, distance, and a decisive advantage over the competition with a BRIDGESTONE golf ball

E6 SOFT: Pack of 12 BRIDGESTONE GOLF e6 SOFT Optic Yellow golf balls for men. These golf balls feature low driver and long iron spin for straighter distance, and an advanced mantle and cover for great approach and green-side performance
SOFT GOLF BALLS: Designed to produce low driver and long iron spin for incredible straight distance; This golf ball is also available in white

BRIDGESTONE GOLF: These golf balls feature the Delta Dimple design for smoother air resistance and greater control to help improve your long game while resisting pop ups for straighter shots on the golf course or in the golf simulator
BRIDGESTONE E6 SOFT GOLF BALLS: A high-performance alternative to golf balls from TaylorMade, Wilson, Titleist, Callaway, Srixon and other leading brands of men's golf balls for sale

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
